xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.4 Nissayavāra » 2.4.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.4.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Kusalattika
Nissayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
197.
678Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
679(Yathā paccayavāre, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
680Nissayavāre anulomaṃ.
